package.name: markov_decision_making
package.description: Markov Decision Making (MDM) is a ROS library for robot decision-making based on MDPs. This metapackage contains: the Markov Decision Making Library itself (mdm_library), the auxiliary packages Predicate Manager (predicate_manager) and Topological Tools (topological_tools), and an example application of MDM (mdm_example)
package.author: Joao Messias
